content: It's about 48 hours to the freeze on substantiative changes to the resources and infrastructure.

I've been through all the FHIr-I, Vocab, MnM, and ITS tasks that were waiting for editorial work, and done most of them. Here's my task list:
- 5899 : clarifications around name and address searching
- 8969 & 10103 - clarifications around slicing
- 8908 - update shareable value set definition & enforce this through the build
- 9648 - flesh out extension examples
- 9843 - changes to element definition id (this is nearly done, but I can't commit the end without investing a day or 2 in snapshot generation)
if any of you have any tasks you'd like me to look at prior to the freeze that are not on that list, please let me know, because I think everything else is done.

there's 3 things I know of that are going to miss the freeze that we want to happen anyway:
- (vocab) - addition of element to code system to clarify the meaning of the concept heirarchy
- (vocab) - addition of new parameters to $expand operation
- (ITS) changes to media type (ITS haven't met since this was discussed on the email list)
if anyone knows of any others, can they let me know please
(oh - and 4: financial resources are not expected to meet the freeze deadline, but i think that's approved by FMG)
unless I hear otherwise, I will focused on IGs and publishing tasks next week
Thanks, what is the freeze date for profiles/IGs?
well, we should be, but I'm letting Lloyd go through the night...
